description:
UPDATE:

OVER 1600 DELIGHTED STUDENTS HAVE TAKEN THIS COURSE

Want to set up Google AdWords Campaign by yourself?

  • Money on Ads spent in a glance, but you got only few calls?
  • Your pay-per-click cost is high, but your position is still not in the top ones?
  • Tired of paying agencies for poorly customized AdWords campaigns?
  • Ready to drill down into context ads yourself, but have no idea where to start?

What does this express-course consist of?

  1. 16 detailed video lessons. Recorded right from my screen. Watch and repeat the steps done in the video.
  2. Practical exercises. Lessons include practice with Google AdWords. To boost your sales, follow my steps, working on your own project.

What prevents your business from getting customers online?

At a snail's pace. Courses pay attention to theory, and there is no time to practice. They have a lot of "water" and you have no time to learn the theory.

"I hired an agency to get AdWords campaign set - budget spent, but yet no calls" - this is what i hear almost every week. And that's why i made this course. Learn the way of quickly setting up advertising by yourself and do not pay a commission to contractors.

Agencies providing lessons usually try to sell something rather than teach.

I have trained 2500+ entrepreneurs, and most of them received their first calls already during the training.

Welcome to Ultimate Google AdWords Search network course!
title: Google AdWords: Do your best in search!
